Movie.Title: Back to the Future
Movie.Synopsis: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

Movie.Title: Stargate
Movie.Synopsis: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

Movie.Title: Its a Wonderful Life
Movie.Synopsis: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

Movie.Title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
Movie.Synopsis: A young Greek woman falls in love with a non-Greek and struggles to get her family to accept him while she comes to terms with her heritage and cultural identity.

Movie.Title: Kellys Heroes
Movie.Synopsis: A group of U.S. soldiers sneaks across enemy lines to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure

Movie.Title: The Good The Bad and The Ugly
Movie.Synopsis: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

Movie.Title: You Only Live Twice
Movie.Synopsis: Agent 007 and the Japanese secret service ninja force must find and stop the true culprit of a series of spacejackings before nuclear war is provoked.

Movie.Title: The Bourne Identity
Movie.Synopsis: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and regain his memory.

Movie.Title: Star Trek: First Contact
Movie.Synopsis: The Borg travel back in time intent on preventing Earths first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.

Movie.Title: Lord of the Rings: The Fellowshp of the Ring
Movie.Synopsis: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle Earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

Movie.Title: Shawshank Redemption
Movie.Synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Movie.Title: Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
Movie.Synopsis: A reluctant hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home, and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug.

Movie.Title: It
Movie.Synopsis: A group of bullied kids band together when a shapeshifting monster, taking the appearance of a clown, begins hunting children.

Movie.Title: Pet Semetary
Movie.Synopsis: Behind a young family's home in Maine is a terrible secret that holds the power of life after death. When tragedy strikes, the threat of that power soon becomes undeniable.

Movie.Title: Moonraker
Movie.Synopsis: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

Movie.Title: The Outlaw Jose Wales
Movie.Synopsis: A Missouri farmer joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

Movie.Title: For a Fistfull of Dollars
Movie.Synopsis: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

Movie.Title: For a Few Dollars More
Movie.Synopsis: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.

Movie.Title: Space Cowboys
Movie.Synopsis: When a retired engineer is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.

Movie.Title: Firefox
Movie.Synopsis: A pilot is sent into the Soviet Union on a mission to steal a prototype jet fighter that can be partially controlled by a neuralink

Movie.Title: 12 Angry Men
Movie.Synopsis: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

Movie.Title: Clue
Movie.Synopsis: Six guests are invited to a strange house and must cooperate with the staff to solve a murder mystery. ABCDEF
